price: Sur toutes vos divergences, le jugement appartient à Allah. Tel est Allah mon Seigneur ; en Lui je place ma confiance et c’est à Lui que je retourne [repentant].
arabic: وَمَا ٱخۡتَلَفۡتُمۡ فِيهِ مِن شَيۡءٖ فَحُكۡمُهُۥٓ إِلَى ٱللَّهِۚ ذَٰلِكُمُ ٱللَّهُ رَبِّي عَلَيۡهِ تَوَكَّلۡتُ وَإِلَيۡهِ أُنِيبُ

version.title: French Translation - Muhammad Hamidullah
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French by Muhammad Hamidullah. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: wamā ikh'talaftum fīhi min shayin faḥuk'muhu ilā al-lahi dhālikumu al-lahu rabbī ʿalayhi tawakkaltu wa-ilayhi unību
